<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>true</before><description>Disable Polaris Experience prior App inbstallation</description><name>Disable Polaris Experience</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var sys_pro = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
sys_pro.addQuery("name","glide.ui.polaris.experience");
sys_pro.query();
if(sys_pro.next()){
	sys_pro.setValue("value","false");
	sys_pro.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-19 03:40:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>08681b7a97661110d9a7b8e6f053afed</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Disable Polaris Experience</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MavenNext EC starter App" source="x_803706_mavenne_0">538736b297e21110d9a7b8e6f053af27</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MavenNext EC starter App">538736b297e21110d9a7b8e6f053af27</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_08681b7a97661110d9a7b8e6f053afed</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-19 03:46:29</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
